name: Vigie
summary: Widget to give visibility from web services providers
short_description:
Vigie is a small widget for your systray providing visibility on webservices exposed data.

The 1st version used SOAP and was tested with SAG webMethods suite.
As per version 2, REST as been implemented as well and Vigie is the companion of choice for my very own Domestik monitoring tool.
